respStmt.resp: WLC2XML[18 Dec 2020] - Transcription from Michigan-Claremont encoding to Unicode with XML markings. See details in notes.
ScanReplace/EditWLC[30 Dec 2020] - Edits/removes transcription notes; removes MDs.
ScanReplace/InsertCGJs[29 Dec 2020] - Places CGJ in Jerusalem VUV words and leading metegs.

publicationStmt.distributor: Via web site:Christopher V. Kimball https://www.tanach.us/Tanach.xml mail@cvkimball.com

notesStmt.note: The original text file wlc420_ps.txt was provided by the Groves Center. The file has the MD5 hash: d31a 6a6e 9afa bf82 272c 2efb 0522 a12e and was dated 25 Jan 2016. Six transcription notes (5,7,F) have been moved to the noted character (Lev 11:42.4, Judg 18:30.11, Isa 9.6.1, Ps 80:14.3, Job 38:13.5, Job 38:15.2) to produce the file wlc420_ps_td.txt for conversion to Unicode and XML by the program WLC2XML. The only other changes to the Groves Center text are: The book names in English and Hebrew of the Jewish Publication Society Tanach and book abbreviations from the New Revised Standard Version have been added.

correction.description: Change merkha (ס֥) to tipeha (ס֖).
correction.author: Shmuel Weissman

correction.description: Change tipeha (ס֖) to merkha (ס֥).
correction.author: Shmuel Weissman

correction.description: Add CGJ to improve display.
correction.author: Ben Denckla

correction.description: Move zarqa ( ס֘ ) to following lamed.
correction.author: Ben Denckla

correction.description: Add note 'c' because of multiple accents on word.
correction.author: cvk

correction.description: Remove dagesh from resh, add note 't'.
correction.author: Alexander Adler

correction.description: Remove mappiq/dagesh from he, add note 't'.
correction.author: Stephen Salisbury

correction.description: Change zaqef-qatan to revia on dalet.
correction.author: Stephen Salisbury

correction.description: Add dagesh to bet, add note 't'.
correction.author: Stephen Salisbury

correction.description: Split word at maqaf.
correction.author: Stephen Salisbury

correction.description: Remove dagesh from tsadi.
correction.author: Stephen Salisbury

correction.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
correction.author: Stephen Salisbury

correction.description: Remove sheva from bet.
correction.author: Stephen Salisbury

correction.description: Remove dagesh from mem, add note 't'.
correction.author: Stephen Salisbury

correction.description: Add revia to bet.
correction.author: Stephen Salisbury

correction.description: Change hireq to sheva on nun.
correction.author: Stephen Salisbury

correction.description: Move revia from samekh to following he.
correction.author: Stephen Salisbury

correction.description: Remove dagesh from shin.

correction.description: Change qamatz to patah on he.

correction.description: Remove dagesh from yod.

biblItem.title: The Leningrad Codex - A Facsimile Edition

imprint.publisher: The J. Alan Groves Center for Advanced Biblical Research ("Groves Center").

profileDesc.creation: From WLC 4.20 provided by the Groves Center.

note.note: Puncta extraordinaria -- an x05c4 is used to mark such marks in the text when they are above the line and an x05c5 when they are below the line. Shown without a superscript.
Large letter(s). Shown as large letters without a superscript.
Small letter(s). Shown as small letters without a superscript.
Suspended letter(s). Shown as suspended letters without a superscript.
Inverted nun in the text. Shown without a superscript.
Text is correct relative to LC. Usually this marks a peculiarity of the LC relative to the other Masoretic texts.
Transcription uncertain. Examine the LC image for other possible readings.
This verse does NOT occur in the Leningrad Codex. Included for continuity of verse numbering.
